Hi,

I am trying to exclude images from my crawl. I read the Tree's blog
po=
sting and I set up a ContentTypeRegExFilter as a midfetch filter,
with if-m=
atch-return=3DTrue and the regexp set to (?i)image/.*

While images do get =
filtered out, I seem to also be losing many
text/html documents, e.g.:

cra=
wl.log:2006-02-27T12:02:57.663Z   200          0
http://qwerks.com/product.=
asp?ProductID=3D5758 - - text/html #026
20060227120257431+227 3I42H3S6NNFQ2=
MSVX7XZKYAYSCX5QBYJ midFetchAbort,3t

I have added this to heritrix.propert=
ies to try to pin down the pb:
org.archive.crawler.filter.ContentTypeRegExp=
Filter.level=3DFINER
...but this doesn't generate any logging.

Any suggest=
ion? If the midfetch abort isn't due to the filter how can
I find out what =
is causing it?

Thanks!
Franck
